Uses of Package
com.appglu.android.cache

Packages that use com.appglu.android.cache
com.appglu.android The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask. 
com.appglu.android.cache Contains the CacheManager interface and it's implementations.
A CacheManager is used for storing and caching files while using the StorageApi. 
com.appglu.android.storage Contains the Storage API implementation for Android.
The Storage API has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server.
 
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.cache used by com.appglu.android
CacheManager
          A CacheManager is used for storing and caching files while using the StorageApi.
There are three CacheManager implementations available: memory (MemoryCacheManager), disk (FileSystemCacheManager) or both (MemoryAndFileSystemCacheManager).
By default FileSystemCacheManager is used and it will cache the files on disk.
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.cache used by com.appglu.android.cache
CacheManager
          A CacheManager is used for storing and caching files while using the StorageApi.
There are three CacheManager implementations available: memory (MemoryCacheManager), disk (FileSystemCacheManager) or both (MemoryAndFileSystemCacheManager).
By default FileSystemCacheManager is used and it will cache the files on disk.
 

Classes in com.appglu.android.cache used by com.appglu.android.storage
CacheManager
          A CacheManager is used for storing and caching files while using the StorageApi.
There are three CacheManager implementations available: memory (MemoryCacheManager), disk (FileSystemCacheManager) or both (MemoryAndFileSystemCacheManager).
By default FileSystemCacheManager is used and it will cache the files on disk.
